items.name: static let rotateX: CAValueFunctionName
items.desc: A value function that rotates by the input value, in radians, around the x-axis. This value function expects a single input value.

items.name: static let rotateY: CAValueFunctionName
items.desc: A value function that rotates by the input value, in radians, around the y-axis. This value function expects a single input value.

items.name: static let rotateZ: CAValueFunctionName
items.desc: A value function that rotates by the input value, in radians, around the z-axis. This value function expects a single input value.

items.name: static let scale: CAValueFunctionName
items.desc: A value function scales by the input value along all three axis. Animations using this value transform function must provide animation values in an NSArray of three NSNumber instances that specify the (x, y, z) scale values.

items.name: static let scaleX: CAValueFunctionName
items.desc: A value function scales by the input value along the x-axis. Animations referencing this value transform function must provide a single animation value.

items.name: static let scaleY: CAValueFunctionName
items.desc: A value function scales by the input value along the y-axis. Animations referencing this value function must provide a single animation value.

items.name: static let scaleZ: CAValueFunctionName
items.desc: A value function that scales by the input value along the z-axis. Animations referencing this value function must provide a single animation value.

items.name: static let translate: CAValueFunctionName
items.desc: A value function that translates by the input values along all three axis. Animations using this value transform function must provide animation values in an NSArray of three NSNumber instances that specify the (x, y, z) translate values.

items.name: static let translateX: CAValueFunctionName
items.desc: A value function translates by the input value along the x-axis. Animations referencing this value function must provide a single input value.

items.name: static let translateY: CAValueFunctionName
items.desc: A value function translates by the input value along the y-axis. Animations referencing this value function must provide a single input value.

items.name: static let translateZ: CAValueFunctionName
items.desc: A value function translates by the input value along the z-axis. Animations referencing this value function must provide a single input value.
